name: Andromedum
description: Andromedum is a VR novel with stereoscopic environments and audio narration. HTC Vive motion controllers are required!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8+ Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon R9 290

reviews.review_text: Wasn't sure what it was, exactly, when I got it. It's a book, a 467(If I remember correctly) page book. The enviroment changes around you as the story moves forward. It is a unique way of reading a book as you can listen to the narrator or read it and turn the pages yourself. I can see other books doing this. Say, a Harry Potter book reading. As they read, you go from under the cupboard to the hotel, the shack, on the train, in Diagon Alley, so forth.  If you want to read a new book in a new way, this is one way to do it. I liked it but others may not.
